abstract: The British Treasury said on Wednesday that it had struck a long-sought deal with the country’s largest banks aimed at increasing lending and limiting bonuses.
snippet: The British Treasury said on Wednesday that it had struck a long-sought deal with the country’s largest banks aimed at increasing lending and limiting bonuses.
lead_paragraph: The British Treasury said on Wednesday that it had struck a long-sought deal with the country’s largest banks on two burning issues: lending and compensation.

headline.main: Britain Reaches Deal With Banks on Lending and Pay
